title: Home, yards, fruit trees, near downtown etc.
app_fee: $16.50adult 1 last name eviction,crime if you provide credit info
posting_body: ['Showings:', 'Maybe Wednesday 7 pm or Thursday 7 pm.', 'Saturday and/or Sunday 4 or 6 pm', 'The front separate unit in the main house is available.', 'The house has some awesome features and some unusual stuff and some damage we can discuss.', ' Parts of it are NOT remodeled to high standards, but there are lots of things I and others really appreciate.', 'The 2nd bedroom has stuff stored in it.', ' The one bedroom  and shared spaces can be available promptly if you would like that.', 'The rent will be discounted until the 2nd bedroom  is available at 1750.', 'If the 2nd bedroom is desired soon it will be 1990 after that is available.', 'Hopefully the 2nd bedroom will be ready for occupancy around the 1st.', "Main house currently might still smell a little from previous tenants' cats and dogs, lots of cleaning has been done.", '\xa0 Some greasy fingerprints still remain but I have some tsp .', 'We have done more patching but there might still be a periodic small leak from the solar panel footer so\xa0sealing off the replaced sheetrock patch should wait at the kitchen ceiling and very small livingroom section.', 'We examined the attic to see if the dining room patch is ok to seal and finish.', 'It looks good but we can discuss.', " The contents of the 2nd bedroom storage is on it's way towards the front door and elsewhere but currently there's just a path through the stuff.", 'Sigh.', 'If you decide you want to apply, and you give solid proof of excellent credit, and the unit is not shared, I sometimes do', 'not insist on doing a tenant screening.', '~$16.50 per adult plus $7 per additional last name for adults.', 'I have a washing machine on site but it is not yet hooked up, same with the electric dryer.', 'and only indirect outdoor hook up of the washer until the 2nd bedroom is available for laundryroom access.', ' Hopefully the washer and dryer still work when hooked up.', 'Please email with all adults approximate credit scores, list of all pets, dogs weights and breeds, and eventually your real email address typed into the message, and your phone number.', ' If the ad is still up the space is still available    :  )', 'I realize that phone calls are great at times, but I really try to do as much as possible by email.', ' If YOU REALLY NEED AN INITIAL CALL please say that, but I might not get to you for quite a while... nothing personal.', 'Photos, ( some dropped off the ad, it may be a while before more reposted)', 'there are numerous fruit trees etc.: apricot, plums many varieties and trees 7 to 40, loquat, nectarine,', 'peach, lime tree?, huge grape vine, huge prickly pear cactus (watch a you tube video BEFORE', 'attempting to eat prickly pear cactus fruit or pads so you can do it', 'safely), abundant rosemary, super food dandelions, roses, olives someday if we', 'learn how to process them, etc.', ' More fruit trees are in pots.', 'Off - street parking is tandem style off a busy street.', ' Thorough cooperation with property-mates, including', 'us, is required to retain driveway parking privileges.', ' There currently will be many times you have the driveway to yourself , usually 99% of the time after I have the second bedroom empty of my excess stuff.', 'A quite large nice armoire will stay, but unfortunately putting it together is a bit of a hard and awkward heavy puzzle.', 'Convenient for bicycling, buses and walking and shopping.', "Over time there can be less or more furniture based on email agreements but I definitely want some of the furniture to stay in the house, some of it I'm okay with going to the carport in a protected from rain and sun way.", 'Please have references and a copy of your credit report available if you', 'are interested in a speedy approval or I can give some limited info on', 'how to get a free credit report.', 'Smoking outdoors only and no drift inside, if there is drift, smoking', 'will not be allowed anywhere on the property, and of course neighbors', 'are important too.', 'Shared power utilities with other property mates if ever relevant is estimated at $70 per month per adult.', 'Just a slow charger outlet for EV currently but large solar with huge electric panel with lots of room.', 'There is a lot of stuff in the backyard some of it is useful , some of it was useful but other people moved things and left things in the rain and sun and are now questionable, some stuff is trash , recycling and composting.', ' unfortunately currently the green waste bins are trucked all the way to Marin', 'so I try very hard to compost or do worm bins or hugelkulture on site.', 'There is a very efficient heat pump for heating and cooling.', '(I researched the most efficient', 'but I learned that it was sized too large and would cycle on and off too often and burn out the motor, so I got the next most efficient smaller unit.', 'Lots of storage plus trash in the backyard Just a slow charger outlet for EV currently but large solar with huge electric panel with lots of room.', 'Again, the backyard currently has a lot of good stuff storef and a lot of stuff that was good but may be junk now and a lot of definitely junk.', 'We have a number of things to do further north and are hoping to head out sometime in August, and we have a bunch of other things to do so we are making progress on the backyard but odds are very high we will not get it looking great.', "But it does have wonderful things growing in it as well and there are some ways to improve the aesthetics that aren't all that hard probably.", 'But I', 'always want to keep fire risk reduction over time in mind.', 'I am open to rent to own but only starting to think about it after a year of tenancy.', "I will probably be much more open to tenancy in common after a year, but I don't know a whole lot about that.", 'It is also possible I will want to keep the property for many years or at least part of it for many years.', 'I already have a very nice white double pane Greenhouse window.', 'I have an over the range exhaust fan.', 'Some of the windows require caution and support to stay up.', 'Thank you!']
